The Series

Title		: MacGyver
Year		: 1985
Season		: 1 of 7
IMDb		: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0088559/
Genre		: Action, Adventure, Crime
Plot		: Angus Macgyver is a secret agent with a difference. He is quiet, 
		mild mannered, deeply principled and refuses to carry a gun on his 
		missions. Fortunately, the last detail is unimportant when compared 
		to his astounding mind. Drawing on a vast practical knowledge of
		science, Macgyver is able to make use of any mundane materials 
		around him to create unorthodox solutions to any problem he faces. 
		The enemies of world peace and justice continually learn that 
		underestimating this man is a fatal mistake for their plans.

Title		: Every Time She Smiles

Plot		: In Bulgaria, MacGyver collects a top-secret microfilm and attempts
		to smuggle it out of the country. At the airport he meets a 
		mysterious beautiful American girl, who turns out to have ties to 
		the Bulgarian Secret Police.
